summary: Jester\'s clothes can be created on the tanning rack using leather or linen. It is also possible to transfer the enchantment from one of the college robes onto a set of jester\'s clothes without enchantments.
descriptionHtml:
Description?
===========
The Casual clothes are without the standard barter / one handed enchantment.
After becoming somewhat tired of wearing mage\'s robes and noticing how well the jester\'s outfit sits on the vanilla female body, I decided to never put on the mage\'s robes again. Also I think it\'s the only pair of pants for women in the game. Needless to say, everyone likes women in pants. And skrits. Doesn\'t really matter, women are okay in any attire. 

Crafting options
==============
tanning rack * 3 leather = Jester\'s Casual Clothes
tanning rack * (JCC + Adept Robes of Alteration) = Jester\'s Clothes - Alteration III
tanning rack * (JCC + Novice Robes of Restoration) = Jester\'s Clothes - Restoration I

It\'s also possible to make the arch mage\'s robes and Thalmor hooded robes into a jester\'s outfit. In both cases you get one more slot to wear an enchanted item because jester\'s outfit does not occupy the head slot.

Converting back is not possible.
author: tox2ik
